alert.note: Alert for Crosby; Floyd; Garza; Hale; Lubbock; Lynn (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 15 at 2:32AM CDT until September 15 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lubbock County in northwestern Texas... Northeastern Lynn County in northwestern Texas... Southwestern Floyd County in northwestern Texas... Northwestern Garza County in northwestern Texas... Western Crosby County in northwestern Texas... Southeastern Hale County in northwestern Texas... * Until 330 AM CDT. * At 231 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Downtown Lubbock, or over Lubbock, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Lubbock, Slaton, Abernathy, Idalou, Ralls, Petersburg, Lorenzo, Ransom Canyon, Cone, Caprock, Texas Tech University, Lubbock International Airport, Southland, Downtown Lubbock, Woodrow, New Deal, Buffalo Springs, and Lubbock Science Spectrum. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Crosby; Floyd; Garza; Hale; Lubbock; Lynn
